title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft operation on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, nothing moves.
EB: When executing the ShiftLeft operation on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the lines should shift to the left by one tab or four spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following lines:
   - A space
   - Some tabs
   - Some text
   - Some tabs
   - Some text2
3. Highlight the two lines mentioned above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft operation.
5. Observe that the lines do not move.
